DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / THE FIRST ROUND ; SPOTLIGHT ; WAS THERE BED_CHECK ON SATURDAY NIGHT ?
DOC.TEXT: All right chaps , let ' s get excited about Switzerland . Coached by Roy Hodgson , an Englishman , and well-organized , the_Swiss beat Romania . . . . The most exciting thing about Switzerland is that Hodgson refused to allow his players to have_sex before matches , and then relented . Now , it is all_right as long as they don ' t do_it the night before a game . SIMON BARNES / Times of London
